Content: Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna this morning (Jan. 02) handed over a letter to the Presidential Secretariat seeking the copies of the reports of Presidential Commission of Inquiry to Inquire and Investigate into Serious Acts of Fraud and Corruption and Presidential Commission of Inquiry into the alleged bond scam. The JVP MP Dr. Nalinda Jayatissa handed over the letter to the Information Officer of the Presidential Secretariat, President's Additional Secretary D. K. S. Ravindran under the Right to Information Act.
